This study plan enroll 80 pregnant research subject 18 year . Patients randomly assign accord computer generate system one two group .
DOC.brief_title: Phenylephrine vs. Norepinephrine Infusion After Spinal Anesthesia Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , experimental , observational , randomized open label , active treatment control trial . After write informed consent obtain , study participant randomly assign use computer generate table 1 2 treatment group prior cesarean delivery . Group A consist : A continuous phenylephrine infusion 0.1 mcg/kg/min maintain systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) within 100-120 % baseline spinal . Group B consist : A continuous norepinephrine infusion 0.05 mcg/kg/min maintain systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) within 100-120 % baseline spinal . Patients admit hold area . Baseline arterial blood pressure heart rate measure supine position , leave uterine displacement . Baseline blood pressure calculate take mean three consecutive SBP measurement take 5 minute apart . IV place . Intravenous ondansetron 4 mg 500 mL Lactated Ringers solution administer prior induction spinal anesthesia . The primary endpoint number provider intervention need maintain SBP within 100-120 % baseline group . The secondary endpoint nausea measure provider intervention induction spinal anesthesia , immediately follow delivery 11 point verbal rating scale ( 0 = nausea , 10 = worst possible nausea ) . Patients also instruct report episode nausea time study . Emesis record whenever present surgical procedure . Hypertensive episode ( SBP great 120 % baseline ) treat cessation infusion . Infusion restart SBP decrease upper limit target range ( 120 % baseline SBP ) . If infusion must stop three occasion , discontinue permanently blood pressure maintain phenylephrine bolus . Bradycardia ( HR le 50 BPM ) treat glycopyrrolate 0.4mg IV ephedrine 5 mg - 10 mg IV bolus . Study participant receive standard spinal anesthetic consist 0.75 % hyperbaric bupivacaine ( 1.6 mL ) plus preservative free morphine ( 0.2 mg ) fentanyl ( 20 mcg ) L3-4 L4-5 interspace ( standard care spinal anesthesia Ruby Memorial Hospital ) . Prior surgical incision , spinal sensory level test bilateral T4 dermatomal level necessary cesarean section spinal anesthesia . The patient position supine wedge place right hip avoid aortocaval compression . Both patient clinical research assistant ( collect data ) blind administer phenylephrine infusion norepinephrine infusion . The study end care transfer labor delivery room nurse . Measured variable include blood pressure ( BP ) , number type provider intervention control blood pressure ( BP ) , heart rate ( HR ) , cardiac output ( CO ) measure noninvasive CO monitor , APGAR score 1 5 minute , nausea vomiting , fetal cord blood analysis delivery .
DOC.criteria: The American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Physical Status classification 1 2 Pregnant woman singleton pregnancy Gestational age great 36 week Cesarean delivery spinal anesthesia Use cardiac medication medication blood pressure control Cardiovascular disease Multiple gestation Gestation diabetes require insulin History postoperative nausea vomit Refusal study Gastric bypass surgery History chronic opioid use ( chronic pain syndrome ) Emergent caesarean delivery maternal and/or fetal distress Eclampsia Progressive neurologic disease Infection insertion site Allergy local anesthetic , narcotic study medication .
